name: WATER WEIRD

traits.name: Invisible in Water
traits.text: The water weird has the Invisible condition while fully immersed in water.

traits.name: Water Bound
traits.text: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

actions.name: Surge
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 10 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.
